column1: We set aside the sentence of 18 years of rigorous imprisonment.
The sentence is altered as follows;

column2: 1.  A sentence of 10 years of rigorous imprisonment is imposed.
2.  A fine of Rs. 10,000/= is imposed.
In default of payment of the fine 6 months of simple imprisonment is imposed.
4.  A sum of Rs. 250,000/= must be paid to the victim girl Gamaathige Ruwandika
In  default  of  the payment  of the  above-stated  compensation,  12  months  of
